comments:
Problem: Analysis context menu is not updated after changing the name of an Analysis Configuration in the Analysis dialog box, exception when selecting it (option with the old name) from the context menu

Expected Result: Menu should be updated after changing the Analysis configuration name in the Analysis dialog box

Steps:
- Created a UML project, created a Class diagram
- Added two Classes and an Interface to the Class diagram from the Palette
- Connected these elements using Associations
- Added Attributes and Operations to Classes
- Saved all
- Right-clicked on the model in PE and selected Analysis --> Open Analysis Dialog
- Created a new Analysis Configuration (called it archdisc01)
- Ran the Analysis
- Changed the Class diagram by adding another Class
- Opened the Analysis Dialog again and this time changed the name of the already created Analysis Configuration to NewAnalysis and clicked on Apply
- closed the Analysis dialog box
- Right-clicked on the model again and selected Analysis
- clicked on the name displayed in the context menu (which is still the old name for the Analysis Configuration)

Result:
- Analysis does not run and the following exception is generated:

Note1: closing and re-opening the application will update the context menu
Note2: This problem is a regression

Stack trace:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

!MESSAGE Error loading launch configuration

	at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.analysis.core.ui.internal.actions.MultiAnalysisActionDelegate$2.run(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Unknown Source)
